name: HandyCopter
description: Control modern RC helicopters and quadcopters, fly through the city. Complete lots of missions, fly into yards and houses, play with pets. Improve the RC control skills to the maximum!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: 2GHz Dual-core CPU Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 1Gb DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space
